EmailTemplate.subject: Esso and Mobil Business Fleet Card Program - Additional Information Required
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in our Esso and Mobil Business Fleet Card Program!
To enroll in an account with us, please send in a deposit to secure the account along with the attached Deposit Agreement. You may either mail the deposit to our bank or wire us the funds.
Sending the deposit by mail:
Complete and sign the attached Deposit Agreement (the minimum deposit is $500). Send the Deposit Agreement to our bank (address below) with a certified check, money order or cashierâ€™s check for the deposit amount you would like to put on deposit. Reference opportunity # {!Opportunity.Opportunity_Number__c} and mention the check is for a secured deposit in the memo section of the check. Either scan/email or fax a copy of the completed and signed Deposit Agreement to me at the email noted below or to:
Bank Address:
WEX Canada Ltd. c/o Bank of Montreal 7090 Union Park Center, Suite 350 Midvale, UT 84047
Wire Transfer Instructions:
Account Name: WEX Canada, Ltd., c/o Bank of Montreal Account Number: 00021548411 SWIFT BIC CODE: BOFMCAM2 Customer Name: WEX Canada, Ltd Please reference opportunity # {!Opportunity.Opportunity_Number__c} Memo Section: Please mention the check is for a secured deposit. Either scan/email or fax a copy of the completed and signed Deposit Agreement to me at the email noted below.
When the deposit is received your account will be set up and the deposit applied will become your line of credit.
Feel free to scan and email the verification to me at the email address noted below, or if you prefer, you can fax it to me at {!User.Fax}. You can also call me at {!User.Phone} if you have any questions.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} {!User.Phone} {!User.Fax} {!User.Email}
